Mintz.from sentence: Mintz proposes the humandesigned feature model .

MultiR.from sentence: MultiR puts forward a graphical model .

MIML.from sentence: MIML proposes a multi -instance multi-label model .

PCNN.from sentence: PCNN puts forward a piecewise CNN for relation extraction .

PCNN + ATT.from sentence: PCNN + ATT proposes the selective attention mechanism with PCNN .

proposes.from sentence: BGRU proposes a BGRU with the word - level attention mechanism .
